title: Homepage Final CTA section cleanup and white background

requirements.summary: Change FinalCtaSection background from primary (navy) to white to match other homepage sections while keeping text readable.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSection.tsx`, the `<section id="contact">` no longer uses the primary (navy) background styling and renders on a white background consistent with the rest of the homepage.
Text colors within the section remain readable on a white background (no low-contrast white-on-white).

file_operations.description: Update the `<section id="contact">` styling to use a white/light background consistent with other sections (e.g., replace `bg-primary` with a white/background utility) and adjust heading/body text classes away from `text-primary-foreground` to readable on-white text colors; keep existing spacing/structure intact.

requirements.summary: Remove the secondary "Contact Us Today" CTA button from FinalCtaSection and clean up any now-unused code.
acceptanceCriteria: The secondary CTA button labeled "Contact Us Today" is no longer rendered in `FinalCtaSection`.
Any now-unused code related only to the removed button (e.g., handler function and icon import) is removed or refactored so there are no lint/type errors.
The remaining primary button continues to work (scrolls to #contact when on the homepage and navigates to `/#contact` otherwise).

file_operations.description: Remove the secondary button markup and delete `handleSecondaryClick`; remove any imports only used for that button (e.g., `Mail`) and ensure the remaining primary buttonâ€™s click behavior remains unchanged and type/lint clean.

requirements.summary: Remove the consultation availability footer text block from FinalCtaSection and ensure spacing remains clean.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer text block containing "Available for consultations across South Africa..." is no longer rendered in `FinalCtaSection`.
The CTA section layout still has appropriate spacing after removing the text block (no awkward extra border/divider left behind).

file_operations.description: Delete the bottom availability text block container (including its border/divider) and tune surrounding margin/padding so the section ends with visually appropriate spacing after the removal.
